target: I made a reservation for 1 person at the hamilton lodge for 4 nights and for 1 person. Here's their phone number 01223365664. Have a nice stay!
context: <user> I'm looking for a place to stay on the east side that includes free parking. <system> I can help you with that! First, let me get more information so that I can assist you better. Are you looking for a guesthouse or hotel? <user> I would like a hotel with 3 stars and with free wifi please. <system> There are none in the East. Perhaps another criteria change? <user> How about the north part of town? <system> There's the Hamilton Lodge. It's a moderate price guesthouse that has both free parking and wifi. Would you like to make a reservation? <user> Yes, please book it for one person for 4 nights starting Friday. <system> How many people are in your party?<user> Just myself for 4 nights starting friday please. <system>
